# description

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the gazetteer settings.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing parameters

- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the gazetteer settings that’s suitable for output during debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the gazetteer settings shown in a playground.
